markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Ignored](/Rules.aspx?ID=3076)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 200 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The PCs either aren’t on this group’s radar or the group knows about the PCs but is generally ambivalent toward them. This carries no special benefits or detriments.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Ignored
